abstract: Mitt Romney likes following the rules, explaining the rules and pointing out to others when they, heaven forbid, break the rules.
snippet: Mitt Romney likes following the rules, explaining the rules and pointing out to others when they, heaven forbid, break the rules.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney likes rules.The former governor of Massachusetts likes following the rules, explaining the rules and pointing out to others when they, heaven forbid, break the rules. At the most recent Republican debate in Las Vegas, Mr. Romney inadvertently cast himself as the Enforcer when he tried mightily to ensure that every candidate received their allotted response time.

headline.main: Romney Seeks Order in Chaos of Campaign
